See also: Leicht and léicht

German[edit]

Etymology[edit]

From Old High German līht, from Proto-Germanic *linhtaz, ultimately from Proto-Indo-European *h₁lengʷʰ-. Compare English light, Dutch licht, Danish let.

Pronunciation[edit]

  • IPA(key): /laɪ̯çt/
  • audio
    		(file)
  • Homophone: laicht
  • Rhymes: -aɪ̯çt

Adjective[edit]

leicht (comparative leichter, superlative am leichtesten)

  1. light (not heavy)
  2. easy (not difficult)
  3. light, lite, diet (of food which is low in calories)
  4. slight

Synonyms[edit]

  • (easy): einfach

Antonyms[edit]

  • schwer

Adverb[edit]

leicht

  1. slightly

Synonyms[edit]

  • wenig

Related terms[edit]

  • erleichtern
  • Leichtheit
  • Leichtigkeit
  • leichtlich

Pennsylvania German[edit]

Etymology[edit]

Compare German leicht, Dutch licht, English light.

Adjective[edit]

leicht

  1. light, easy, simple
